title: Mocha Satin Midi Wrap Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a mocha brown satin midi wrap dress, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, waist tie belt, subtle sheen, no model, no mannequin, no body parts
style_fit: regular fit with adjustable waist tie
techpack: Mocha brown satin wrap dress with long bishop sleeves, V-neckline, midi length. Self-fabric waist tie belt for adjustable fit, covered buttons on sleeve cuffs, polyester blend lining for comfort. Topstitching detail along neckline and hem for durability.
provenance: Inspired by the trending brown color palette, designed for commercial womenswear with a timeless wrap silhouette.
design_text:
Mocha Satin Midi Wrap Dress (BRN001)
Colors: mocha brown, warm taupe, soft beige
Fabrics: satin, polyester blend lining
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: wrap
Sleeves: long bishop sleeves
Neckline: V-neck
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t,  , w, i, t, h,  , a, d, j, u, s, t, a, b, l, e,  , w, a, i, s, t,  , t, i, e
Trims & details: self-fabric waist tie belt, covered buttons on cuffs, topstitching along neckline and hem
Techpack: available
